…today in support of the Pregnant Students' Rights  Act, legislation that affirms a simple but powerful principle:  Expecting mothers should be encouraged to pursue their education like  any other student.

Pregnant students often receive incorrect guidance or no guidance at  all on how to navigate classes while pregnant. In many cases, women  feel pressured…
